name: MEC Sun Dodger Cape Hat - Unisex
description:
Superheros wear capes and protect you from villains. This hat has a cape to protect you from the elements. The fabric sheds light rain and the underbrim is darkened to prevent sun glare. Remove it on days when you just want to rock the cap.Made from nylon fabric with DWR and UPF 50+ finish for weather protection.Soft polyester sweatband keeps sweat out of your eyes.Foam brim holds its shape and keeps the sun out of your eyes.Removable 9-inch neck cape attaches with snaps to protect your neck from sunburnElastic webbing at back offer a snug, non-restrictive fit.

        Sustainability
